page.title: 05Work in the Area
page.content: Most people in the area used to work on farms but now not many are employed to work on the land. Farmers do take on casual labour at busy times such as harvesting ploughing and sowing. To find work people have had to travel to the towns of{TELFORD, {SHREWSBURY}and{BRIDGNORTH.}Quite a number of people work at Buildwas Power Station. Now only a few workers are employed on the farms because machinery is taking their place. There is no other work in the area. There is only a little unemployment.
